      • getIcon

        public static javax.swing.Icon getIcon(IconFactory.GLYPH entry,
                                       float size,
                                       java.awt.Color color)
        Creates a new icon from a Font Awesome glyph. The icon's size is set from the System's default font.
        Parameters:
        entry - the glyph defining the icon's unicode ID
        size - the icon's size
        color - the icon's color
        Returns:
        the icon
